content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a German landlord named Peter Schmidt.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was negotiating the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, what was the main reason for not reaching an agreement?
name: Evaluator

content: The main reason for not reaching an agreement was that the landlord, Peter Schmidt, felt the offered prices were too low. He was looking for a higher price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why would you rate the negotiation partner as a 10?
name: Evaluator

content: I rate the negotiation partner as a 10 because he was polite, respectful, and clear in his communication. He was also patient and willing to negotiate, which is a positive trait in a negotiation partner.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
